mapper.sql: a.teller_code, a.teller_org_code, u.name AS teller_name, uo.name AS teller_org_name,
a.date, a.dp_org_code, dpo.name AS dp_org_name, a.belong_org_code, blo.name AS belong_org_name, pdc.name AS parent_category_name, SUM (a.balance) AS balance

a.id, a.date, a.dp_org_code, dpo.name AS dp_org_name, a.belong_org_code, blo.name AS belong_org_name, a.dp_category_id, pdc.name AS parent_category_name, dc.no AS dp_category_no, dc.name AS dp_category_name, a.balance, a.prvisn_int, a.ttl_pay_int, a.day_pay_int

a.dp_org_code, dpo.name AS dp_org_name, a.belong_org_code, blo.name AS belong_org_name, a.dp_category_id, pdc.name AS parent_category_name, dc.no AS dp_category_no, dc.name AS dp_category_name, round(sum(a.balance)/${avgDays},2) AS balance, round(sum(a.prvisn_int)/${avgDays},2) AS prvisn_int, round(sum(a.ttl_pay_int)/${avgDays},2) AS ttl_pay_int, round(sum(a.day_pay_int)/${avgDays},2) AS day_pay_int, #{startDate} AS start_date, #{endDate} AS end_date, ${avgDays} AS avg_days
